products.title: Premier 35mm Grained White Faux Wood
products.description: Their best-selling 35mm premier faux wood range are made from high-quality flame-retardant pvc slats, and this bright, embossed white faux wood easily brightens the room. A perfect addition to rooms that need optimum light and privacy control, their faux wooden blinds are great for kitchens and bathrooms, with easy-care wipe-clean slats and a clean tailored finish, these blinds are a firm favourite with their customers.

products.title: Ivory
products.description: Ivory satin metal venetian blind.

products.title: Lifetime Smooth Dark Grey
products.description: Lifetimesmoothdark greybrings an emphatic colour statement in yourroom, what's not to like about grey? Their outstanding quality lifetime blinds are made to the same high standards as all their other venetian blinds - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by their 3 year guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fox) and a pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail.
